snippet: The system was created to make it easier to identify which teachers performed the best so their methods could be replicated, and which performed the worst, so they could be fired.
abstract: New York State officials and education experts say New York City appears to be doing better job of evaluating teachers than rest of state, with more teachers earning highest, second-highest and lowest rankings.
lead_paragraph: The system was created to make it easier to identify which teachers performed the best so their methods could be replicated, and which performed the worst, so they could be fired.

headline.main: New York City Teachers Score Highly Under New Evaluation System
headline.print_headline: City Teachers Score Highly in Reviews
